text:
Briteskies | Cleveland, OH | FULL TIME | ONSITE

Briteskies is looking for a talented LAMP senior developer / architect type. We're a 'smedium' technology company that does a lot of work with Magento in large scale implementations and integrations of that software into various ERPs, CRMs, etc. The opportunity is specific to a senior developer ho can help our architect give techical direction & guidance as well as career advice fro our growing team.

Anyone in the Cleveland area interested in having a chat can reach me @ gian at briteskies dot com. Thanks!
